### Conflicts

* #18654 (rpc: separate bumpfee's psbt creation function into psbtbumpfee by achow101)

This change d

In commit "refactor: Replace confusing OMITTED_NAMED_ARG with OMITTED" (fab2f3bb6446d5202b7a665cde1e7c0d02718e18)\n\nAlong lines of laanwj's comment https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19262#issuecomment-644913854, it doesn't seem like `is_top_level_arg` is the right condition to be checking here. It seems helpful to add ", optional" for any field value, not just a top level argument value.

In commit "refactor: Replace confusing OMITTED_NAMED_ARG with OMITTED" (fab2f3bb6446d5202b7a665cde1e7c0d02718e18)\n\nFor a future followup I think it'd be good to consider renaming `Optional::OMITTED` to `Optional::YES` to match the `Optional::NO`. It doesn't seem clear in context what "OMITTED" actually omits.
